languages.text: {n}Идира с яростью выругивается.{/n} "Небольшое воздействие... да это же кусок плоти и костей, в котором каким-то жутким образом еще держится душа и разум! Ледышка, дай им умереть спокойно и дело с концом!"

{n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира с яростью выругивается.{/n} "Небольшое воздействие... да это же кусок плоти и костей, в котором каким-то жутким образом еще держится душа и разум! Ледышка, дай им умереть спокойно и дело с концом!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freaky miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira déverse un flot de jurons.{/n} « Un peu de biomancie... Ce n'est qu'un imbroglio de chair et d'os qui, par on ne sait quel miracle, est parvenu à conserver une âme et un esprit ! Allez, le rabat-joie, laissez-le donc mourir dignement ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira déverse un flot de jurons.{/n} « Un peu de biomancie... Ce n'est qu'un imbroglio de chair et d'os qui, par on ne sait quel miracle, est parvenu à conserver une âme et un esprit ! Allez, le rabat-joie, laissez-le donc mourir dignement ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラが激しく罵る。{/n}「この『生体秘法』ってやつは…肉と骨がもつれあったものだけど、奇妙な奇跡によってまだ魂と心が残っているのよ！さあ、アイスマン、もう安らかに死なせてあげましょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが激しく罵る。{/n}「この『生体秘法』ってやつは…肉と骨がもつれあったものだけど、奇妙な奇跡によってまだ魂と心が残っているのよ！さあ、アイスマン、もう安らかに死なせてあげましょう！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉愤怒地骂了一句。{/n}“‘小小的生物法术’……这可是活生生的人，虽然已经变成了乱七八糟的肉和骨头，可它碰巧还有灵魂和思想！我说，冰人儿，你就不能让他安息吗？！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉愤怒地骂了一句。{/n}“‘小小的生物法术’……这可是活生生的人，虽然已经变成了乱七八糟的肉和骨头，可它碰巧还有灵魂和思想！我说，冰人儿，你就不能让他安息吗？！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira zetert wild los.{/n} "'Mit etwas Biomantie' ... Dieses Gewirr aus Fleisch und Knochen hat durch ein aberwitziges Wunder noch immer eine Seele und einen Verstand! Kommt, Eismann, lasst sie endlich in Frieden sterben!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira zetert wild los.{/n} "'Mit etwas Biomantie' ... Dieses Gewirr aus Fleisch und Knochen hat durch ein aberwitziges Wunder noch immer eine Seele und einen Verstand! Kommt, Eismann, lasst sie endlich in Frieden sterben!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira maldice, furiosa.{/n} «"Un poco de biomancia"... ¡Esto es una maraña de carne y hueso que solo conserva su alma y su mente de milagro! Vamos, hombre de hielo, ¡déjales morir en paz de una vez!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira maldice, furiosa.{/n} «"Un poco de biomancia"... ¡Esto es una maraña de carne y hueso que solo conserva su alma y su mente de milagro! Vamos, hombre de hielo, ¡déjales morir en paz de una vez!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira hışımla sövüyor.{/n} "'Biraz biyobazlık ile' ha... Bu et ve kemik yığını, garip bir mucize sonucu ruhunu ve aklını korumayı başarmış! Bırak da huzur içinde ölüp gitsin be buz küpü!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira curses furiously.{/n} "'A little biomancy'... This is a tangle of flesh and bone that, by some freakish miracle, still happens to have a soul and a mind! Come on, iceman, let them die in peace already!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, hışımla sövüyor.{/n} “'Biraz biyobüyü’ ha... Bu et ve kemik yığını bir garip mucizeyle ruh ve akıl sahibi olmuş! Bırak da huzur içinde ölüp gitsin be buz küpü!”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
